Articles.Content:
I am sure I read on the forum somewhere that someone had created an add on that reads your save file and gives you a report on what science is left to be discovered. Can someone link it here if they have it bookmarked?

Thanks,

Probus

http://oarcinae.us/ScienceParser/kspScienceParser.html

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/73876-Web-Science-Summary-Utility

I think you mean this web app.

Also, I think you used the wrong forum for your thread .
Thanks for the info Senshi. I reposted in a different forum. I think the tool had biomes crossed by experiments.

I found it today. It is a Science Remaining script compatible with 23.5. With ScienceAlert its a slam dunk for forgetful Kerbalnauts:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75716-0-23-5-See-Science-Remaining

http://kerbal-science-remaining.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/

Just mouseover the boxes to see which instrument.
